+1 ATTACK+1 ACCURACYRange 8   Threat 3   1 Energy   LOADED
On Hit

Targets become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

Templates:

GRUNT


Systems:

HORNET

STINGER PISTOL

No description given.

WEAVE

Each round, the first attack made against the Hornet as a reaction automatically fails.

IMPALE SYSTEMS

The Hornet makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, they take {3/4/5} Heat and become Jammed until the end of their next turn.

LOCK/HOLD JAVELINS

The Hornet fires a javelin at a character within range 5 and line of sight. The target must succeed on a Hull save or be impaled, at which point the javelin tethers itself and its victim to the ground (or another surface), rendering them Immobilized and Shredded. They, or any adjacent character, can attempt to remove the javelin with a successful Hull save as a full action; otherwise, this effect lasts for the rest of the scene or until the Hornet takes this action again.

GRUNT

CHAFF

The Grunt has 1 HP and can’t gain more. Unlike other characters, they never take damage when they succeed on a save – regardless of the weapon or system used – but otherwise take damage normally.

WEAK

The Grunt can never have more than 1 Structure and 1 Stress, and they are immediately destroyed when they take heat from any source other than their own systems and weapons.

RANK AND FILE

The Grunt can’t take the Veteran, Squad, Elite, or Ultra templates.
